Create coverage plots for all trees

Source: R/plot_coverage.R
create_coverage_plots.Rd

Function to create coverage plots for all unique treecodes in the provided rings df (usually QWA_data$rings) in a for loop. Plots can be shown and/or saved to a specified path.

Usage

create_coverage_plots(df_rings, save_plot = TRUE, path_out = "./")

Arguments

df_rings

rings dataframe

save_plot

should the plot be written to disk under path_out

path_out

path where the plot should be saved.
